item.title: Introduction
item.description: Reinforcement Learning Elements of Reinforcement Learning Policy (策略) Reward signal (獎勵訊號) Value function (價值函數) Model (模型) Limitations and Scope An Extended Example: Tic-Tac-Toe Minimax 動態規劃 演化式方法 使用價值函數 Reinforcement Learning RL 的目標：學習怎麼在給定狀
